name: Lost Souls (and Paperwork)
description:
You are tasked with a very important mission. Find the souls of those, whose paperwork got mixed up and who landed in hell by a mistake! But be aware, the demons don't like intruders, especially ones that are trying to take away their playthings...

5 different enemy types (5 more in plans)
6 different items (12 more in plans)
and 5 different stats to manage!

Made for Combustion Game Jam 2022
